title: Soivre Salt Shampoo Balance & Detox 350 gr
description: Regulating shampoo indicated for oily hair. Regulates the sebum produced, reduces itching and irritation. Gently cleanses without weighing hair down. Does not contain parabens.
cleaned_text: Sea SymControl and Niacinamide. Removes traces of fat without weighing not contain parabens. amount to wet hair and massage into the roots and scalp. Add a little water to make the foam and rinse well. Question
